attributes.action: Help for self employed that aren’t eligible For scheme & can’t claim anything
attributes.additional_details: I’ve noticed there’s thousands of people like myself that are not eligible for the scheme & grant and think something else should be out there when there’s people out there that haven’t worked All there lives and can claim all kinds I’ve paid tax all my life as most of us can’t claim anything else If living with a partner who earns over £600 a month but how are we meant to pay Mortgage bills etc Something else needs to be done.
attributes.background: Help the self employed that haven’t been eligible from the start & not eligible for grants that have paid tax even if they have been employed for so many years & gone self employed Some people cannot claim anything like universal Credit because they live with a partner

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845

Introduce an emergency Universal Basic Income during the COVID-19 outbreak
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560132
